document.full_text: trevor cahill out-pitched opposing ace c.j. wilson yet again for his american league-best sixth win as the oakland athletics beat the texas rangers 7-2 on monday.
document.title: oakland athletics' cahill improves to 6-0 in win over rangers
lines_and_colors: trevor cahill out-pitched opposing ace c.j. wilson yet again for his american league-best sixth win as the oakland athletics beat the texas rangers 7-2 on monday.
